files.patch:
@@ -98,0 +98,8 @@
+# Test and fix riscv64.
+if [ "x$OUT" = x ]; then
+  if [ `uname -s` = Linux ]; then
+    if [ `uname -m` = riscv64 ]; then
+      OUT=riscv64-unknown-linux-gnu
+    fi
+  fi
+fi
